body: Alexander Belenkiy (LJ user macos) posts photos (RUS) taken in the neglected - but not yet fully deserted - coal miners' towns in Perm region, where the first mine appeared in 1797 and the last one closed in 2000: "All this resembles today's Abkhazia or wartime Grozny."
